activity.includedActivitiesStart: Unit process starts with the receiving of the aluminium hydroxide, produced onsite.
activity.includedActivitiesEnd: Includes calcination of Al(OH)3 to Al2O3 and it's infrastructure. No transports are included because Al2O3 is produced in the same plant as Al(OH)3.

generalComment.text: Data on Al(OH)3 extraction and calcination to Al2O3 was aggregated on original source (IAI 2015, IAI personnal communication 2017). In- and outputs of AL(OH)3 are calculated according to the stoichiometry (1.530 kg Al(OH)3 --> 1.000 kg Al2O3 + 0.530 kg H2O). Separate energy data was provided by IAI for production of hydrate and calcination processes.
Two sources were used in the creation of this dataset: IAI 2015 Survey data; and original ecoinvent 2 data (Althaus, 2007) for flows unreported by IAI.

As reported by the IAI: "Total alumina production is the quantity of aluminium oxide trihydrate produced in a defined period and expressed as 100%, nominal aluminium oxide (Al2O3) equivalent, irrespective of further processing. Total alumina production figures have two components, that to be used for the production of aluminium (metallurgical grade alumina) and that to be used for any other purpose (chemical grade alumina)." (IAIA, 2019, ALUMINA PRODUCTION. Retrieved from: http://www.world-aluminium.org/statistics/alumina-production/, accesseed 11 Feb 2019).

classification.classificationValue: 2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

geography.shortname: IAI Area, Asia, without China and GCC

comment.text: While IAI data are global in scope, flows not reported by IAI and taken from anterior ecoinvent v2 dataset are based on European data.
Average technology for the aluminium produced globally.

representativeness.samplingProcedure: 2015 LCI Survey Data was collected by the IAI in Feb - July 2016 with analysis and data verification taking place Aug - Dec 2016.
representativeness.extrapolations: Flows are based on a life cycle inventory survey carried out by IAI for its member and non-member companies, except energy related data that are supplied from IAI annual energy surveys (electricity, fuel inputs).No data obtained from the IAI 2015 Life Cycle Survey from this region. Global averages are adopted here. Amounts based on IAI 2015 Energy Survey actually cover about 85% of regional production, although again not all sites reported all flows.

Local datasets used in calculation: IAI Area, EU27 & EFTA (2015-2015) PV: 5920000000, IAI Area, Russia & RER w/o EU27 & EFTA (2015-2015) PV: 4076000000, IAI Area, South America (2015-2015) PV: 13212000000, RNA (2015-2015) PV: 6449000000, CN (2015-2015) PV: 58979000000, UN-OCEANIA (2015-2015) PV: 20377000000, IAI Area, Asia, without China and GCC (2015-2015) PV: 6234000000
- The input exchange 'aluminium hydroxide' has an activity link and therefore requires a valid product exchange for that input to be available. If the valid product exchange is not available the dataset will be put on hold at the end of its review and will remain on hold until such a valid product exchange has been accepted into the ecoinvent database.
